<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Inspect an eh-frame CFI record.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">EHFrameCFIBlockInspector &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Identify CFI record type and edges based on number and order of edges</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// in the given block only. This assumes that the block contains one CFI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// record that has already been split out and fixed by the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// DWARFRecordSplitter and EHFrameEdgeFixer passes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Zero or one outgoing edges: Record is CIE. If present, edge points to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// personality.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Two or three outgoing edges: Record is an FDE. First edge points to CIE,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// second to PC-begin, third (if present) to LSDA.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It is illegal to call this function on a block with four or more edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EHFrameCFIBlockInspector <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#ad58e7c9140c2bee787d0e5f8f253af89">FromEdgeScan</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/block">Block</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns true if this frame is an FDE, false for a CIE.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#ac10e058969be40f8f634bd1783e5b1e5"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#ac10e058969be40f8f634bd1783e5b1e5">isFDE</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CIEEdge != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#a5209b3defc29c58a86d0f6731d3f20b7"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#a5209b3defc29c58a86d0f6731d3f20b7">isCIE</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CIEEdge == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If this is a CIE record, returns the Edge pointing at the personality</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// function, if any.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It is illegal to call this method on FDE records.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#a6a9aed8bcac31d30ce314b92154192c6"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/edge">Edge</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#a6a9aed8bcac31d30ce314b92154192c6">getPersonalityEdge</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Creates a pass that records the address and size of the EH frame section.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If no eh-frame section is found then the address and size will both be given</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Authors of JITLinkContexts can use this function to register a post-fixup</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">/// pass that records the range of the eh-frame section. This range can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">/// be used after finalization to register and deregister the frame.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
